Room.Name: Vlassen's Plane
Room.ShortDescription: You are in an intersecting plane between this world and another.
Room.LongDescription: Vlassen sits on pillows, a small boy with a smooth face and a tender young body. His eyes follow you, and appear to be ancient pools of darkness as they peer into your soul. He slowly twists a heavy strand of knotted human hair in his small hands as he waits for you to speak. The elderly men mutter and glare as they also wait. Do not anger them further, as they are powerful in spite of their appearances.
